title: Hiruko Type Family
content:
Hi Guys,

Go easy on me here, as I admit I am a beginner. However, I have just spent around 300 hours and 8 weeks working on my first type family. It's been absolutely pain staking work, but now it's complete I think it's worth it. Have and look and let me know if you like it, It's been accepted by T26, but again I am a beginner learning a new craft, so please go easy on me :D

[http://www.behance.net/Gallery/Hirukoa-Type-Family/125049](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018025128/http:/www.behance.net/Gallery/Hirukoa-Type-Family/125049 "http://www.behance.net/Gallery/Hirukoa-Type-Family/125049")

Thanks,  
Alex.
author: Thinkdust

comments.content: You’d better show your typeface in the [Typeface critique-board](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018025128/http:/typophile.com/forum/1). There is the usual place for these things. BTW: I like the alternate cuts. :D
It looks a bit like a rounded Avant Garde.
Thanks Renko, will do. I am having problems uploading the designs though it seems to not work, any tips?
